messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] War Poetry Contest Finalist Claire Braz-Valentine "Open Letter to John Ashcroft"
messages.msgSnippet: Hi again....this poem is so satirical, so good, I really just had to share it w/ you all...... Gotta run, Brianna is sick. Janis ... From: coyote s corner To:
messages.messageBody:
Hi again....this poem is so satirical, so good, I really just had to share it w/ you all......

Gotta' run, Brianna is sick.

Janis
----- Original Message -----
From: coyote's corner
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups. com
Sent: Friday, May 23, 2003 10:28 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] War Poetry Contest Finalist Claire Braz-Valentine "Open Letter to John Ashcroft"


Valentine "Open Letter to John Ashcroft"


Hi Everyone:

Here is a thought provoking and sometimes humorous poem by Claire
Braz-Valentine entitled "An Open Letter to John Ashcroft, Attorney
General of the United States." Claire was a finalist in a recent war
poetry contest.

Click here: 2002 War Poetry Contest - Finalist - Claire Braz-Valentine
